sentences.en: A near friend is better than a far dwelling kinsman.
A relative by blood or marriage; a kinsman or kinswoman.
sentences.cn: 因血缘关系或婚姻关系而成的亲戚; 男亲戚或女亲戚.

sentences.en: Kinsman helps kinsman, but woe to him that hath nothing.
sentences.cn: 亲人帮亲人, 无亲愁煞人.

sentences.en: NIV So the kinsman - redeemer said to Boaz ,'Buy it yourself.'And he removed his sandal.
sentences.cn: 8[和合]那人对波阿斯说: “ 你自己买吧! ” 于是将鞋脱下来了.

sentences.en: So when the kinsman said to Boaz, Buy it for yourself, he drew off his sandal.
sentences.cn: 8那亲人对波阿斯说, 你自己买罢; 于是将鞋脱下来了.

sentences.en: The bride kinsman gathered to make preparations for the wedding.
sentences.cn: 新娘的男亲属们聚集在一起为婚礼做准备.

sentences.en: Your kinsman became one of those depredators you have described to us?
sentences.cn: 您这位表亲终于沦落为您给我们描绘的那种盗匪了 吧 ?
